title: Lakshmi Studs - A Timeless Touch of Tradition
materials: meticulously crafted with a radiant Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with brilliant-cut White Cubic Zirconia. The center features a cluster of vibrant Red and Green synthetic stones.
features: These exquisite studs feature a geometric square design, a subtle twist on the classic round stud. The outer border is embellished with dazzling Cubic Zirconia, creating a halo effect. The inner design features a traditional floral pattern rendered with Red and Green gemstones, providing a vibrant contrast to the gold. Open work setting allows light to pass through the gemstones.
colors: Primarily gold with highlights of white (Cubic Zirconia)
occasions: or as a charming addition to a half-saree function (Langa Voni Function). Adds a touch of elegance to both traditional and modern attire.
description: These studs blend tradition with contemporary design, making them versatile and suitable for all ages. The high-quality 22K gold ensures durability and lasting value. The traditional South Indian color palette of red, green, and gold brings good fortune and prosperity. The intricate craftsmanship is a testament to the rich heritage of Hyderabad jewelry.
